item.title: Show HN：ChartDB代理 - DB模式设计的光标
item.description:
去年，我们推出了ChartDB OSS（ https：//news.ycombinator.com/item.com/item？id = 449722238 ） query/sql/dbml) without needing direct DB access.Now we’re launching the ChartDB Agent.It helps you design databases from scratch or make schema changes with natural language.You can:- Generate schemas by simply describing them in plain English- Brainstorm new tables, columns, and relationships with AI- Iterate visually in a diagram (ERD)-确定性导出SQL脚本在此处尝试 - https://chartdb.io/ai/ai - 无需注册。
评论url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item？id=45437594 点：47 ＃评论：14
